item.title: 20 - 10 Songs from 1980
item.author: pokerslade@gmail.com
item.description: Remember The 80s: The year that chaotically bridged the '70s and its latter trends of disco and punk with the new decade, 1980 was a dynamic and intriguing year for pop music. Accordingly, the best tunes from this year tended to contain elements of the decade just passed even as they forged new paths, such as the blending of disco beats with heavy use of synthesizer, an instrument that would play a huge role in the '80s. Visit http://rememberthe80s.blogspot.com/
item.itunes:author: SirGeorge
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 - 10 Songs from 1980
item.itunes:summary: Remember The 80s: The year that chaotically bridged the '70s and its latter trends of disco and punk with the new decade, 1980 was a dynamic and intriguing year for pop music. Accordingly, the best tunes from this year tended to contain elements of the decade just passed even as they forged new paths, such as the blending of disco beats with heavy use of synthesizer, an instrument that would play a huge role in the '80s. item.title: 09 - Remember The 80's - The Two Coreys
item.author: pokerslade@gmail.com
item.description: Remember the 80s - Child Stars. Best friends. Recovering party animals. Corey Haim and Corey Feldman have one of the most unique friendships in Hollywood. They literally grew up together both on and off the screen, starring in a string of hit films including The Lost Boys, Stand By Me, Gremlins, The Goonies, and License to Drive. Now it's 20 years later and they're staring in The Two Coreys.
item.itunes:author: SirGeorge
item.itunes:subtitle: 09 - Remember The 80's - The Two Coreys
item.itunes:summary: Remember the 80s - Child Stars. Best friends. Recovering party animals. Corey Haim and Corey Feldman have one of the most unique friendships in Hollywood. They literally grew up together both on and off the screen, starring in a string of hit films including The Lost Boys, Stand By Me, Gremlins, The Goonies, and License to Drive.
